phrases: There really are not many espers, are there?
All of these people have walked by and not one has stood out.
You are not tricking me, are you?
There really have not been any.
Hey, are you on a date here?
Who is this obviously special guy?
I am going to borrow him for a bit.
Someone is using my name and fighting?
It is a student from Salt Middle School.
You should go see for yourself.
The Older Brother Bows Destructive Intent
I could ask you the same thing, Ritsu.
Oh, that is his younger brother.
Who are all of these people on the ground?
I am not so boorish as to watch siblings fight.
There is no way you would do this.
This is why I hate brats.
I am not going to hang around for a battle I know he will lose!
I have got the feel of it now.
Nii-san, I have realized something very important.
You really do have psychic powers...
You have wanted to use them for so long!
When you were little, you used to cry your eyes out because you could not bend spoons.
Who would have thought that now
That had not changed up until recently.
I have always wanted psychic powers.
And I have always admired you, Nii-san.
Aw, you are making me blush...
But that was a big misunderstanding.
I could not handle my inferiority complex and fear towards you,
so I was protecting myself by thinking it was admiration.
I never knew what you would do if you got stressed out.
We could never even have a fight as brothers...
Because I have no way to protect myself from your powers.
So I did my best not to stress you out in any way.
Now, that is just a humiliating past.
I tried so hard for so long,
no matter how crazy it made me...
you never worked hard in your life, so why?
But now, I have obtained them.
Now I do not have to be scared anymore.
Now I have just lost all interest...
The buddy-buddy brothers act ends now, Nii-san.
But I guess it is true...
Half of that is true, right?
I am terribly sorry that my little brother hurt you.
Please still be friends with him from now on.
You think that is enough to be forgiven?!
It is no use trying to get rid of me...
I would like a status update.
It is been ten minutes since you reported that you have found the target.
Hurry up and bring him here.
Actually, just in case, send a photo.
It will be troublesome if you bring the wrong brat.
There is no doubt that that is Kageyama Shigeo.
It is just as the data from the Awakening Lab says.
The more information we leak, the more annoying it will be.
If you do not want us to beat the crap out of your brother, get your face over here.
I do not want to see anyone else hurting people,
Who the hell do you think you are, small fry?!
Only the strongest can give orders.
Just how pathetic are these people?
It is such an obvious thing that you forget about it.
You guys figure that if you are strong at fighting,
you can rule your school and turfs, right?
But he is on a different level.
You guys do not have a chance of beating him.
So I am going to remove him from the fighting grounds.
You can continue your squabbling in peace.
How dare you do that to our boss?!
You thugs are such simple creatures...
Did I hit him too hard?
Well, if he dies, I would say he was just unlucky.
What is with that rebellious stare?
We are reviewing the scene you were playing out earlier.
Will this make you a little more willing?
If you do not grovel, I will kill all of you.
It is a great lesson for idiots who mistake youth and freedom.
I have got one piece of advice for the rest of your rotten lives.
Try to live your lives walking on the side of the road as much as possible,
so you do not because anyone else trouble.
I was not told about a psychic brother.
Oh, so you have put up a barrier?
I am not supposed to use these powers against others,
He is the adult esper I saw before...
There are ways to deal with little esper brats like you.
I do not want to become an adult like him.
My powers rip through your barrier like an excavator.
You are going to protect your little brother, right?
He is hitting him way too much.
That is what you wanted, right?
I do not like that look on your face...
This is the first time this has happened.
He made me put my hands to the ground...
Hey, mister, who did terrible things to us...
Just so you know, this is all your fault.
Do not ever show your face in front of us again.
You are actually making me use my trump card...
Why will not he fall over?
At this rate, things will not end well...
If I do not put up my guard, I will be knocked out in an instant.
To think a guy like that existed...
He is not White T Poison's older brother...
He is the infamous shadow leader at Salt Middle School...
Taking him on in a battle of abilities is not good.
I do not have a choice.
If you are not going to give up, I will end it.
The next move will be the last.
My knife will not go through!
I do not like using his stuff, but I do not have time.
I guess you have all seen my face.
As annoying as it is, I am going to have to make you all disappear.
Do you really think I will let you get away after everything you saw?
I cannot take him on anymore!
It is still dangerous to be near him.
You are from Black Vinegar Middle School...
I cannot believe someone was able to push him this far.
The guy and Ritsu are gone.
This is rock salt from the Himalayas.
It goes great with pasta or meat.
Let us perform the exorcism with this.
A fortuneteller told me there was something on them.
So they just told her that and took the money?
First, we will weaken it with the rock salt powder.
And this scraping noise by your ears...
This will be really annoying to spirits that want to live in a quiet place,
We will use the hard edges of the rock salt and do a massage
to loosen up your tense muscles and improve your blood flow.
We will place a hot towel on your face,
and shut out the spirit's visual interference.
Along with using aroma oils to maximize your relaxation,
we will light some incense that spirits hate.
This is one of Reigen's special moves, where he sends his clients on a beauty trip
that relaxes the body and soul.
Thank goodness there was no actual spirit this time,
but this is the first time Mob did not show up to work on time.
I am going to have to lecture him when I see him next.
If there is anything troubling you, let me know.
I will be there to listen anytime.
If something is bothering you, I will listen.
I am sorry I did not realize it sooner.
I do not know who those guys are!
They have been following me around for a few years now.
Is that why you are living by yourself when you are in middle school?
Let me give you a warning.
It is an organization called Claw, formed by dangerous espers.
They want a revolution and aim to turn the world on its head.
Their ability to function as a group is first-rate,
and they have over a hundred espers.
There are plenty of facilities across the world that are trying to
But the only one to succeed at it is Claw.
Apparently they take child espers who have yet to mature,
brainwash them, and raise them as soldiers.
They are not as powerful as us Naturals,
but if you underestimate them, their sheer numbers will easily crush you.
You sure know a lot about them.
I heard all about them from one of their guys who tried to kidnap me before.
Though I taught him a lesson.
Basically, they are from a very dangerous world.
Shigeo, you could have been killed back there!
Ritsu, my little brother, was kidnapped.
I am going to go save him.
But I think I can win.
But why are they after your little brother?
There is a research facility where people like you were gathering.
Ritsu was going there recently, too.
So the information must have leaked from there.
Though, I have a terrible feeling about this...
How could they do this to civilians?
They are unconscious, but not dead.
You will need to answer our questions first.
Did you sell Kageyama Ritsu's information to Claw?
I do not know who that is.
The one I invited here was Kageyama Shigeo-kun.
This all started with a misunderstanding,
and yet they really managed to awaken Ritsu.
I have no idea what is going on.
And we were finally seeing some hope in our research, too.
Looks like this guy does not know anything.
To think there are people like them...
What kind of level of power did the kids who were kidnapped have?
I would like to know to know what we are up against.
Do not make me spank you.
Do not scare them more than necessary.
I am fine, but we really should not fight back right now.
Trapped in a suspicious research facility,
Ritsu tries to plot an escape with the good-for-nothing espers.
Meanwhile, Mob rises to save Ritsu.
That is what you call a man.
Option B, the serious course, involves buying the Blu-rays and the manga volumes.
